body:
Look, in my honest opinion, even though I'm an unranked Nautilus main... I think Riven is not that bad to go against. Certainly yes she's a bit iffy here and there with her damage, but I really enjoy her backstory and her gameplay, and I made friends with some Riven mains over the years I've been on here and they're my dearest friends yet xD. But anyways for all the Riven mains that just want a glass of water in this hell, I give you a fan art of Lighting Storm Riven, made by a fan known as kair030....

...And yes...this was late at night and it was cold so I wasn't totally blushing...but I was. If RiotPenguin was here he would agree that this picture would make you blush.

Well I can say that I have examined them all quite closely...its not what you think it is.

Of course, her gameplay is fine, but the fact that she has ALL ad scaling on her abilities(1 to 1 ratio on w and e, having her lowest ratio being 60% 0n her Q which is usable 3 times....), free steroid passive, with ult being a % BONUS AD STEROID, that STACK for each other.

But her story and idea is nice, i just feel that she needs to lose something. AND WHY THE HELL does she have a **MAGIC SWORD** but is entirely AD, but {{champion:266}} has both ad and ap ratios...

{{champion:266}} and {{champion:92}} are very simular.... and aatrox doesn't need a shield or aoe stun to accomplish his tasks.
your right he needs an aoe knock up super broken op lifesteal and a revive passive...

meanwhile the only time you knock enemies up is when they are in the epicenter of the jump, which is very small if you have ever played Aatrox you would know... THAT CAN BE INTERRUPTED, and has a resource of 10% of your hp just to be interrupted, that is not broken powerful, that is broken REDUNDANT.

Secondly, Riven builds hydra and bloodthirster in most scenarios so she has just as good lifesteal, paired with a shield that helps her for being aggressive, nice try. The only way Aatrox is super sustained is because he has so many AS steroids in his kit to make 3 AA proc sooner in battle.

And please tell me how the revive passive is gonna help you survive in the middle of the enemy team hmmm? Aatrox passive is useless when you get left inside there team, it is at its strongest only during lane phase where you can dive for free, but falls off to almost uselessness late game.

if u need to ask how aatrox will survive a team with his passive then any futher comments i make to you will be like talking to a brick wall aatrox is a tank with high dmg and lifesteal nuff said if u cant figure it out from there than im sry that my attempts of trying to explain to you why your "main" is almost as broken as yi will never succeed because as a common quote where im from "you cant fix stupid and you cant argue with crazy"

Ok, for one aatrox is by no fucking means a tank or a bruiser, if he builds any defenses he loses out on damage, and if you only build damage you cannot survive long enough to output the damage. Secondly, don't call out people as brick walls when statistically and factually riven is stronger in most cases, minus sustain. 

rivens passive gives her free damage for abilities, up to 50%, while Aatrox does 100% ad on extra damage from w, but COSTS YOU HEALTH in the process, so you are using your hp to do more damage and taking damage from enemy also, a lose lose situation.

I am not an Aatrox main, I just can't see how you are saying Aatrox's AOE knockup is more oppressive than RIVENS AOE KNOCK UP when they do the same, where riven only has to hit a butto 3 times to do it while Aatrox loses 1/10 his hp to hope he lands uninterrupted, and stun on top of that. 

Aatrox's sustain is the only thing he has to help him, his q and e in some ways hinder himself, as if he isn't stacking w, he can't survive long enough.

There really is no comparison here. Riven has better sustain through shield than Aatrox does through his W when it comes to actually fighting. Riven has more mobility, better cc, better damage. Aatrox's only advantage is the ability to accidentally (or purposefully in RARE cases) die in lane without penalty. 

I am neither a Riven main or Aatrox main, I am not really fond of either champion, but trying to make Aatrox sound anywhere near as powerful as Riven in a joke. 100% joke.
